name: TimeCrunch - HTC Vive
description:
TimeCrunch is a fast-paced cereal feeding frenzy, playable on the HTC Vive. Preferably at parties.

Spoon mode: dip the spoon in the bowl before trying to feed Bill.

Cereal Shotgun mode: Trigger to fire. Press Trackpad to break barrel and reload. Flip barrel back up to close.

–

Timecrunch is the result of a Vive-fueled game jam to make something fun for our office party. It's not a complete game, just a tale of breakfast gone wrong. To be played with the lights low, the music loud, and in the middle of a crowded room.
